name: Typhoon's Awakening - Myth Horror
description:
Save system ;
-There is a save system in Typhoon's Awakening, each time you clear a map and get into the next one, your progression on the lore is saved for the session.
--> PROGRESS WONT BE SAVED if you quit the game.
The game is meant to be played within a single session to get the full experience / as the game happens during a single night. Endings ;
There is two endings to Typhoon's Awakening, the normal one, and a secret one.
To get to the secret one, you'll need to be curious and carefully explore the areas you are to explore through the game.
-> Through feedbacks you help me improve my concepts/motivate me to keep going. I am eager to get yours.
